description: Explore how blockchain technology is revolutionizing smart cities by enhancing transparency, data management, urban governance, and energy management. Overcoming challenges like scalability and legal frameworks, blockchain is set to transform urban landscapes amidst rapid urbanization and climate change.
keywords: Blockchain, Smart Cities, Urban Landscape, IoT, AI, Big Data Analytics, Decentralization, Energy Management, Urban Governance, Transparency, Data Privacy, Technology, Sustainable Integration, Urban Planning
title: Blockchain and Smart Cities: Revolutionizing Urban Landscapes
